languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс не двигается с места и смотрит вам прямо в глаза.{/n} "Баланс сил, леди {name}. Подобная "инициатива" от меня в прилюдном месте будет проинтерпретирована вашими поддаными как нападение. Или попытка опорочить репутацию — что, кажется, вас не волнует ни в коей мере, не правда ли?"

{n}Heinrix does not move a muscle, but looks you right in the eye.{/n} "Think of the power dynamics, Lady {name}. Such a display of 'initiative' by me in public would be interpreted by your subjects as an attack. Or an attempt to tarnish your reputation — but you couldn't care less about that, could you?"
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс не двигается с места и смотрит вам прямо в глаза.{/n} "Баланс сил, леди {name}. Подобная "инициатива" от меня в прилюдном месте будет проинтерпретирована вашими поддаными как нападение. Или попытка опорочить репутацию — что, кажется, вас не волнует ни в коей мере, не правда ли?"

Such a display of 'initiative' by me in public would be interpreted by your subjects as an attack. Or an attempt to tarnish your reputation — but you couldn't care less about that, could you?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

Such a display of 'initiative' by me in public would be interpreted by your subjects as an attack. Or an attempt to tarnish your reputation — but you couldn't care less about that, could you?"

Such a display of 'initiative' by me in public would be interpreted by your subjects as an attack. Or an attempt to tarnish your reputation — but you couldn't care less about that, could you?"

Such a display of 'initiative' by me in public would be interpreted by your subjects as an attack. Or an attempt to tarnish your reputation — but you couldn't care less about that, could you?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix no mueve un solo músculo, pero te mira fijamente a los ojos.{/n} «Piense en la dinámica de poder, mi señora {name}. Semejante exhibición pública de "iniciativa" sería interpretada por sus súbditos como un ataque. O un intento por mancillar su reputación. Pero a usted eso no le importa, ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix does not move a muscle, but looks you right in the eye.{/n} "Think of the power dynamics, Lady {name}. Such a display of 'initiative' by me in public would be interpreted by your subjects as an attack. Or an attempt to tarnish your reputation — but you couldn't care less about that, could you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix no mueve un solo músculo, pero te mira fijamente a los ojos.{/n} «Piense en la dinámica de poder, mi señora {name}. Semejante exhibición pública de "iniciativa" sería interpretada por sus súbditos como un ataque. O un intento por mancillar su reputación. Pero a usted eso no le importa, ¿verdad?».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは身体を動かさない代わりに、こちらの目を直視してきた。{/n}「我々の力関係をお考えください、レディ・{name}。公の場で俺から『アプローチ』した場合、あなたの臣下たちは俺が攻撃を仕掛けたと解釈するか、あなたの評判を失墜させる試みだと思うだろうが…そんなことは一切気にしてない様子だな」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix does not move a muscle, but looks you right in the eye.{/n} "Think of the power dynamics, Lady {name}. Such a display of 'initiative' by me in public would be interpreted by your subjects as an attack. Or an attempt to tarnish your reputation — but you couldn't care less about that, could you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは身体を動かさない代わりに、こちらの目を直視してきた。{/n}「我々の力関係をお考えください、レディ・{name}。公の場で俺から『アプローチ』した場合、あなたの臣下たちは俺が攻撃を仕掛けたと解釈するか、あなたの評判を失墜させる試みだと思うだろうが…そんなことは一切気にしてない様子だな」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希一动不动，直直地盯着你的眼睛。{/n}“想想权力是如何运作的吧，{name}女士。若是我在公共场合‘主动’，你的臣民可能会误以为我在袭击你，或是企图玷污你的名声。不过，你一点都不在乎，是吧？”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix does not move a muscle, but looks you right in the eye.{/n} "Think of the power dynamics, Lady {name}. Such a display of 'initiative' by me in public would be interpreted by your subjects as an attack. Or an attempt to tarnish your reputation — but you couldn't care less about that, could you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希一动不动，直直地盯着你的眼睛。{/n}“想想权力是如何运作的吧，{name}女士。若是我在公共场合‘主动’，你的臣民可能会误以为我在袭击你，或是企图玷污你的名声。不过，你一点都不在乎，是吧？”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix reste immobile, mais vous regarde droit dans les yeux.{/n} « Pensez au rapport de pouvoir, dame {name}. Une telle "initiative" publique de ma part pourrait être interprétée comme une attaque par vos sujets, ou comme une tentative de salir votre réputation... Mais vous n'en avez cure, n'est-ce pas ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix does not move a muscle, but looks you right in the eye.{/n} "Think of the power dynamics, Lady {name}. Such a display of 'initiative' by me in public would be interpreted by your subjects as an attack. Or an attempt to tarnish your reputation — but you couldn't care less about that, could you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix reste immobile, mais vous regarde droit dans les yeux.{/n} « Pensez au rapport de pouvoir, dame {name}. Une telle "initiative" publique de ma part pourrait être interprétée comme une attaque par vos sujets, ou comme une tentative de salir votre réputation... Mais vous n'en avez cure, n'est-ce pas ? »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix rührt keinen Muskel, sieht dir aber direkt in die Augen.{/n} "Bedenkt das Machtverhältnis, Lady {name}. Würde ich in der Öffentlichkeit eine solche 'Initiative' zeigen, würden Eure Untertanen das als Angriff werten. Oder als Versuch, Euren Ruf zu besudeln. Doch das wäre Euch völlig egal, nicht wahr?"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix does not move a muscle, but looks you right in the eye.{/n} "Think of the power dynamics, Lady {name}. Such a display of 'initiative' by me in public would be interpreted by your subjects as an attack. Or an attempt to tarnish your reputation — but you couldn't care less about that, could you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix rührt keinen Muskel, sieht dir aber direkt in die Augen.{/n} "Bedenkt das Machtverhältnis, Lady {name}. Würde ich in der Öffentlichkeit eine solche 'Initiative' zeigen, würden Eure Untertanen das als Angriff werten. Oder als Versuch, Euren Ruf zu besudeln. Doch das wäre Euch völlig egal, nicht wahr?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix does not move a muscle, but looks you right in the eye.{/n} "Think of the power dynamics, Lady . Such a display of 'initiative' by me in public would be interpreted by your subjects as an attack. Or an attempt to tarnish your reputation — but you couldn't care less about that, could you?"

languages.text: {n}Heinrix'in kılı kıpırdamazken doğrudan gözlerinin içine bakıyor.{/n} "Hiyerarşi denen bir şey var {name} Hanım. Tarafımca herkesin içinde yapılacak o tarz bir "hamle", tebaanca saldırı olarak yorumlanabilir. İtibarına leke sürmek istediğim sanılabilir... Gerçi sen bunu pek umursamıyorsun, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix does not move a muscle, but looks you right in the eye.{/n} "Think of the power dynamics, Lady {name}. Such a display of 'initiative' by me in public would be interpreted by your subjects as an attack. Or an attempt to tarnish your reputation — but you couldn't care less about that, could you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix'in kılı kıpırdamıyor ama direkt gözlerinin içine bakıyor.{/n} "Hiyerarşi denen bir şey var {name} Hanım. Tarafımca herkesin içinde yapılacak o tarz bir "hamle", tebaanca saldırı olarak yorumlanabilir. İtibarına leke sürmek istediğim sanılabilir... Gerçi senin de çok umurundaydı, değil mi?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
